titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to redesignate a facility as the National Hansen's Disease Programs Center, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 107-174.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

action.text: Mr. Bilirakis moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2441.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 12/4/2001--Passed House without amendment. Amends the Public Health Service Act to redesignate the Gillis W. Long Hansen's Disease Center as the National Hansen's Disease Programs Center.
